commit.message:
Add endpoint for `/eth/v1/beacon/states/:state_id/validators/:validator_id`

 - pre-requisite for validator client being able to use the updated duties api's

 - ensures the validator client can lookup the id of a validator by its pubkey.

 partially addresses #2809

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

nodes.bodyText: nit: NumberFormatException seems a bit wrong for this error case?

Just curious: I saw the same pattern in the other PR as well. Why do we have a ValidatorResponse class that gets wrapped up in a GetStateValidatorResponse class without adding any other variables or methods?
